```{r}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(ggrepel)

robots <- import("https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/annual-industrial-robots-installed.csv?v=1&csvType=full&useColumnShortNames=true")

robots <- robots %>% 
  filter(Entity != "World")
  
```

## Original

![original graph](../annual-industrial-robots-installed.png)

```{r}
ggplot(robots, aes(Year, installations, color=Entity)) +
  geom_line(size = .8) + 
  geom_point() + 
  labs(
    title = "Annual industrial robots installed in top five countries",
    subtitle = "Industrial robots are automated, reprogrammable machines that perfor a variety of tasks in industrial settings.",
    x="", y=""
  )+
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(2011, 2014, 2016, 2018, 2020, 2022, 2023)
  )+
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = seq(0, 300000, 50000),
    labels = scales::label_number(big.mark = ",")
  )+
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 18, family = "serif"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 9, family = "sans", color = "grey35"),
    
    panel.background = element_rect(fill="white"),
    panel.grid = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_line(linetype = "dashed", 
                                      color = "grey80",
                                      linewidth = .5),
    axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_line(color = "grey70", linewidth = .6),
    axis.line.x.bottom = element_line(color = "grey70", linewidth = .6),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "grey40"),
    legend.position = "none"
  ) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#771199", "#E74C3C", "#8B4513", "#1C4587", "#487654"))
```
